sentence: Selecting the East Tower to be closer to the restaurants and casino floor we were more than pleasantly surprised with a room on the 69th floor overlooking the Belagio fountains
Since we were such frequent guests over the years we even established friendships with the staff both in the restaurants and in the casino

I am not a gambler and was in town for a conference so can not comment on the casino except to say that it was not noisy and was not built like a maze as it is in some venues meaning that I could walk across it with a minimum of annoyance to get to my room
STK good steaks and service with live DJ Overall although my stay rating was 910 but if come again to Vegas i l have to discover other resorts ie Venetian or Wyn
I used this to go to the South Outlets indoor mall North is outdoors and way too hot
Their ventilation system in the casino needs to be turned up a few notches
The club is good but like many of the new casinos very much of the same
Avoid The Cosmopolitan hotel casino restaurants clubs and shops at all costs
Casino not best in Vegas and has some slot machines with balys on them so to me it is got second hand machines
We spent time in the casino for a few minutes each day in passing to our room
The Casino floor is massive but easy to navigate the pool service awesome and the terrace one bedroom extraordinary with awesome views
From food to casino to the view in my room all were top notch
The casino was clean and staffed with respectful servers
Casino and bars are all very glam pools are nice
Right across the street is the Miracle Mile mall with several reasonably priced places to eat and drink in and around it
The casino itself is always busy with friendly and helpful cocktail waitresses
We did not stay in a room but the Casino Area was beautiful clean and the staff were super helpful when we asked about a specific restaurant
Also busy fun casino
Nice hotel casino on the Las Vegas strip
Casino good sometimes never left the hotel
